org.apache.logging.log4j.core.appender.rolling.RollingFileManager

  • Packages that use RollingFileManager 
    Package Description
    org.apache.logging.log4j.core.appender.rolling
    Rolling File Appender and support classes.

    • Uses of RollingFileManager in org.apache.logging.log4j.core.appender.rolling

      Subclasses of RollingFileManager in org.apache.logging.log4j.core.appender.rolling 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  RollingRandomAccessFileManager
      Extends RollingFileManager but instead of using a buffered output stream, this class uses a ByteBuffer and a RandomAccessFile to do the I/O.
